Race.SpecificTitle: PW School Board -- 6.22 Mills - SB - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide School Proposition
(Property Tax Continuation)

Summary:  10 year, 6.22 mills property tax continuation for paying a portion of the cost of operating and maintaining public elementary and secondary schools in the Parish.
Race.FullText: Shall the School Board of the Parish of Iberville, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), continue to levy and collect a special tax of six and twenty-two hundredths (6.22) mills on all of the property subject to taxation in said District (an estimated $2,513,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2012 and ending with the year 2021, for paying a portion of the cost of operating and maintaining public elementary and secondary schools in the Parish?
